title: 2019 Oscar winners: The full list
body: Los Angeles: The Oscars, or Academy Awards, the highest honours in the movie industry, were handed out at a ceremony on Sunday in Hollywood. Supporting Actress: Regina King, ‘If Beale Street Could Talk’ Animated Feature: ‘Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse’ To stay on top of the ever-changing world of business, subscribe now to our newsletters.
